message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I believe I can make a fair offer of $95 for the product.
I understand you're looking to make a fair deal, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $100 for the product.
I see you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.

I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $105, Bob. I'm starting to think we're at an impasse. However, I'm willing to make one last offer to you. I'll sell it to you for $108, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. However, I must stick to my original offer of $100 for the product.
